comment: Last weekend (2016-07-09) we used this recipe for two double batches with minor changes. Mashed a couple degrees (C) cooler and used Wyeast 1056. Thank you for sharing/posting your recipe!

Wow nice. That's a big commitment. Ya when I made it, it was super close. My clarity was lacking. Your changes are good. That should dry it out further. 1056 is close to us-05. Good luck. Tell me how it turns out!
